snippet: The animated musical, expected to generate nearly $1 billion in ticket sales, increased quarterly earnings to $1.84 billion, up from $1.38 billion a year ago.
abstract: Walt Disney Company reports fiscal first-quarter profit of $1.84 billion, or $1.03 a share, up 33 percent from $1.38 billion, or 77 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 9 percent to $12.3 billion.
lead_paragraph: The animated musical, expected to generate nearly $1 billion in ticket sales, increased quarterly earnings to $1.84 billion, up from $1.38 billion a year ago.

headline.main: Disney Reports Strong First-Quarter Earnings, Helped by Animated Film ‘Frozen’
headline.print_headline: Disney Reports Strong First-Quarter Earnings, Helped by Animated Film ‘Frozen’
